title: Legendary Snowball Update [UPDATED 25TH @ 1730]
body:
We made a mistake with the times shown on the website. Legendary Snowball actually started at 19:00 AEDT on December 23. It is live right now.

If you purchased a Legendary or Ultimate skin between 00:01 and 19:00 AEDT on December 23 ~~can you please contact player support.~~
UPDATE: We've identified every player who was affected by this and have handed out mystery gifts to them in a batch. **There were some that were missed** and ~~we will be performing a new batch shortly.~~ < This batch has also completed.

If you already opened a ticket, you can reopen if you need clarification on your situation.

Really sorry about this :( We made an error with the version of the site showing live.

EDIT - NEW ISSUE: Hi Everyone, we're aware that some of you **purchased Legendary or Ultimate skins after the start time of 7 PM AEDT on the 23rd and still did not receive your free mystery gift** through the Legendary Snowball promo.
We've identified how this happened and are now working on a solution to get a mystery gift to anyone that was missed.
The issue should no longer occur for future purchases.

Hi there Krawia,

It is good to know that we have your support for our Snowdown 2015 event. While we appreciate your effort in grabbing the Dragon Trainer Tristana skin, I regret to say that only legendary skins that are bought within the Legendary Snowball event are eligible for the reward. As I have checked and as mentioned by orochikyo, your transaction was completed prior to the event period. I'm sorry, but you have not earned a Mystery Skin for this purchase and regrettably, I am unable to manually grant you this reward.

I know that I have provided you with an answer that you were not hoping for, but I hope that you will still continue to contact us if you need anything else. We'd be more than willing to assist you the best way we can within our capabilities.

Regards,

Kunoichi
Riot Player Support
Maven of the Strings
